properties.name: spring.velocity.allow-request-override
properties.description:
Set whether HttpServletRequest attributes are allowed to override (hide) controller
 generated model attributes of the same name.

properties.name: spring.velocity.allow-session-override
properties.description:
Set whether HttpSession attributes are allowed to override (hide) controller
 generated model attributes of the same name.

properties.name: spring.velocity.cache
properties.description: Enable template caching.

properties.name: spring.velocity.charset
properties.description: Template encoding.

properties.name: spring.velocity.check-template-location
properties.description: Check that the templates location exists.

properties.name: spring.velocity.content-type
properties.description: Content-Type value.

properties.name: spring.velocity.date-tool-attribute
properties.description: Name of the DateTool helper object to expose in the Velocity context of the view.

properties.name: spring.velocity.enabled
properties.description: Enable MVC view resolution for this technology.

properties.name: spring.velocity.expose-request-attributes
properties.description:
Set whether all request attributes should be added to the model prior to merging
 with the template.

properties.name: spring.velocity.expose-session-attributes
properties.description:
Set whether all HttpSession attributes should be added to the model prior to
 merging with the template.

properties.name: spring.velocity.expose-spring-macro-helpers
properties.description:
Set whether to expose a RequestContext for use by Spring's macro library, under the
 name "springMacroRequestContext".

properties.name: spring.velocity.number-tool-attribute
properties.description: Name of the NumberTool helper object to expose in the Velocity context of the view.

properties.name: spring.velocity.prefer-file-system-access
properties.description:
Prefer file system access for template loading. File system access enables hot
 detection of template changes.

properties.name: spring.velocity.prefix
properties.description: Prefix that gets prepended to view names when building a URL.

properties.name: spring.velocity.properties
properties.description: Additional velocity properties.

properties.name: spring.velocity.request-context-attribute
properties.description: Name of the RequestContext attribute for all views.

properties.name: spring.velocity.resource-loader-path
properties.description: Template path.

properties.name: spring.velocity.suffix
properties.description: Suffix that gets appended to view names when building a URL.

properties.name: spring.velocity.toolbox-config-location
properties.description:
Velocity Toolbox config location, for example "/WEB-INF/toolbox.xml". Automatically
 loads a Velocity Tools toolbox definition file and expose all defined tools in the
 specified scopes.

properties.name: spring.velocity.view-names
properties.description: White list of view names that can be resolved.
